Title: Enacts the "Long Island power authority ratepayers protection act"
Summary: Enacts the "Long Island power authority ratepayers protection act"; requires a public hearing in each county within the service area before approval of a final rate plan.
LawCode: Amd §§1020-d & 1020-f, Pub Auth L; amd §3-b, Pub Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law and the public service law, in relation to enacting the "Long Island power authority ratepayers protection act"
